game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: mineclone2
game.short_description: Survive, farm, build, explore, play with friends, and do much more. Inspired by Minecraft, pushing beyond.
game.title: VoxeLibre (formerly MineClone2)

long_description:
The inventory textures in MineClone2  are now darker to be easier on the eyes.

Warning: Some of the text may be difficult to read because, as far as I know, there is not a way to change the color of Minetest's default black text. Setting font_bold (font bold by default) in the advanced settings to true can help make it easier to read.
name: mcl_dark_inv
title: MineClone2 Dark Mode Inventory
